full_summary:
====================

**Pharmaceutical Freezers Invitation to Tender**
------------------------------------------------

### Official Notification

The Director Services Contracting 3 (D Svcs C 3) invites qualified contractors to submit their bids for the provision of fifteen (15) Pharmaceutical Freezers to store vaccines and pharmaceuticals at frozen temperatures.

### Tender Details

| **Category** | **Description**                            |             |
|--------------|--------------------------------------------|-------------|
| **Tender ID**| `cb-137-72379793`                          |             |
| **Tender Title**                                   | Pharmaceutical Freezers                     |             |
| **Language**                                        | English, French                           |             |
| **Deadline**                                        | January 17, 2024, 14:00 EST                 |             |
| **Location**                                        | Petawawa, ON, CAN                          |             |
| **Procurement Method**                               | Competitive – Selective Tendering          |             |

### Goods or Services Required

The procuring authority requires fifteen (15) Pharmaceutical Freezers to store vaccines and pharmaceuticals at frozen temperatures. The products must be delivered as soon as possible after contract award.

### Background Information

This solicitation is issued against the Supply Arrangement (SA) `E60PV-19EQUI` and all terms and conditions of the SA apply.

### Documents Available

The documents associated with this tender are available online. All interested contractors are encouraged to review them thoroughly before submitting their bids.

### Submission Requirements

Only bids submitted by January 17, 2024, 14:00 EST will be considered. All bids must be submitted in accordance with the instructions provided in the tender documents.

### Selection Criteria

The lowest priced bid will be selected, provided that the bidder meets all the requirements specified in the tender documents.

### Trade Agreements

Bidders are responsible for confirming their eligibility under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), as well as other trade agreements referenced in this notice.
